OrgName: Knowles Corporation and its subsidiaries and affiliates in the United States
activities: Knowles and its subsidiaries and affiliates in the United States will use and otherwise process EU and Swiss Employee Data in the United States for the following purposes:  personnel administration and management (including workforce and workflow planning, career development and training), benefits related activities, providing IT support and services and centralizing company systems and applications, succession planning, global directory administration, monitoring and ensuring compliance with applicable laws and Knowles policies and procedures and investigating possible breaches of such laws, policies and procedures.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel and Director of Compliance
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, Germany, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
